com.defano.jmonet.canvas.observable

Interface CanvasCommitObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBoundsTool, AbstractLineTool, AbstractPathTool, AbstractPolylineTool, AbstractSelectionTool, AbstractTransformTool, AirbrushTool, ArrowTool, CurveTool, EraserTool, FillTool, FreeformShapeTool, LassoTool, LineTool, MagnifierTool, OvalTool, PaintbrushTool, PaintTool, PencilTool, PerspectiveTool, PolygonTool, ProjectionTool, RectangleTool, RotateTool, RoundRectangleTool, RubberSheetTool, ScaleTool, SelectionTool, ShapeTool, SlantTool, TextTool

    public interface CanvasCommitObserver
    An object which listens to changes being committed to a canvas.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCommit(PaintCanvas canvas, ChangeSet changeSet, BufferedImage canvasImage)
      Fires when an new shape or image is committed from scratch onto the canvas.

    • Method Detail

      • onCommit

        void onCommit(PaintCanvas canvas,
              ChangeSet changeSet,
              BufferedImage canvasImage)
        Fires when an new shape or image is committed from scratch onto the canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas on which the commit is occurring.
        changeSet - The set of changes being committed.
        canvasImage - The resulting canvas image (including the committed change)
